decisions.description:
In this decision we are checking to see if the opportunity stage change is still open or moved to a closed stage.
***Delete this and everything after this once you've updated for customer*** Review the Data Integrity Framework document for this customer and use that to map the customer's stage names to scaleMatters' opportunity stages as to what is still open, closed ghosted, closed lost and closed won. Based on those stage values you can update close date, set other fields, etc in this section. If you do not need you can simply delete this decision. ***END***
decisions.name: Check_Opportunity_Status_FIXME
decisions.label: Check Opportunity Status - FIXME
